feed.title: South Bruce Peninsula - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , South Bruce Peninsula
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:34 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 1.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 5:00 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 1.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 82 %
Dewpoint: -1.6°C
Wind: N 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with freezing rain. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow or freezing rain at times mixed with ice pellets beginning near noon. Snowfall amount 10 cm over northern sections. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow or freezing rain at times mixed with ice pellets ending in the evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the evening and overnight. Wind east 30 km/h becoming light overnight. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023
